channel.title: Server already in use (port already in use) 317/562
channel.description:
hello, on every source that i try to run, it always says the port/server is already in use. I know that i dont have two sources running, so it must be something with my firewall maybe?
Anyone help?

item.title: Server already in use (port already in use) 317/562
item.dc:creator: @chippeh chippeh
item.description:
@chippeh wrote:

yer firewall is blocking the port from opening :3

Start>Control Panel>Security Center>Windows Firewall>Exceptions>now add port 43594 on TCP and UDP name it w/e you wantâ€¦ your port should be open.

Read full topic
item.source: Server already in use (port already in use) 317/562

item.title: Server already in use (port already in use) 317/562
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

It means you have another program that is using the port your server is running on.

Read full topic
